properties.name: vk.redirect-uri
properties.description: URI to redirect with code or token.

properties.name: vk.display
properties.description: Authorization display type. Could be page/popup/mobile.

properties.name: vk.api-version
properties.description: VK API version, latest on 17/10/17 is 5/68.

properties.name: drawing.background-color
properties.description: Color to show when pixel is not colored yet.
